What this means is that you'll struggle to read the dial half the time - I kept having to cup the dial to see what's on it. And because it's domed, I sadly ended up with a few dirty scratches on it.2. Second, the dial - it's surprisingly hard to read at times!! The big dial is great, no doubt. But I spend way too long staring at the day indicator dial. They should've labeled all the 6 big spokes (?) instead of just two of them.Now, most of you would say "these aren't big issues!" And they aren't, but they were exacerbated because3. The buttons are too big! They protrude too far, and get clicked easily. This causes the day or the date to shift, and I see myself fail at the one big reason.All in all, I ended up fussing over it more than I wanted to. I wish they update these minor issues in a future iteration.
